info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN COLUMBIANA COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salem, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Salem, Columbiana, Leetonia, Guilford Lake State Park, and Winona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central Ohio.
